comments:

exception and the workbench hangs on launching.

The description leads me to believe that the JUnitTestSuite is actually an empty
file.  Can you please verify this, or attach the file to the defect record?

If the file is empty, I'd like to understand how you created the test suite, and
if you can reproduce the creation of an empty (or otherwsie invalid) test suite.

Created an attachment (id=15589)
hyades config files to reproduce the exception

to reproduce:

I select run->Test->test_configuration and if not selected choose junitsuite.
Then in error log the exception appears, and in Run dialog the error "no
deployment selected".

test_configuration.launch and the other files are in attachment

I have used the attached config files, and I am unable to reproduce this
problem.  It works fine.

Closing this defect for now -- if you are able to reproduce this on either the
3.0.1, 3.0.1.1 or HEAD builds of Hyades, please provide more details on how to
reproduce.
